thread.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl's RJ Cyler is the Blue Ranger in the Power Rangers reboot
thread.title_full: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl's RJ Cyler is the Blue Ranger in the Power Rangers reboot

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl's RJ Cyler is the Blue Ranger in the Power Rangers reboot
text:
1 Movies News Me and Earl and the Dying Girl's RJ Cyler is the Blue Ranger in the Power Rangers reboot Friday, Oct 23 2015, 20:40 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Zordon and Alpha 5's new Power Rangers squad is almost complete - with the addition of RJ Cyler to its main cast. Me and Earl and the Dying Girl standout Cyler has signed on for the Power Rangers reboot as the Blue Ranger, production company Lionsgate has confirmed. 
© Getty Images / David M. Benett Cyler will be working alongside Naomi Scott ( Terra Nova ) as the Pink Ranger, Ludi Lin ( Monster Hunt ) as the Black Ranger and newcomer Dacre Montgomery as the Red Ranger.Only the Yellow (and maybe Green) Ranger is left to complete the set.This reboot of the Power Rangers franchise will be masterminded by Dean Israelite, the director behind this year's sci-fi movie Project Almanac . 
© Shout! Factory - Saban Brands Star Trek 's Roberto Orci was originally attached to produce the revival of the kids' series, but he quit the project last autumn.
